channel.title: To get Pictures
channel.description: To get a picture of your server onto the forums the only thing you have to do is when u want a screen shot just press Prt Scr near the top left of the keyboard, then paste it in paint, cut off the sides, then put a rectangle around the pic and save as: ....... then upload it on http://www.imageshack.us/ *make it 21inch cuz all the other ones are small* and then copy and paste one of the lines of the url onto the thread and it should have a link or directly on the thread. _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Anyone who wants to put comments just post them.... Thank you :) :D :) :D :) :D :) :D I am usually Mago on any servers so just talk to me if you see me

item.title: To get Pictures
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

This is RS2 Server Dev, this belongs to Moparisthebest.com/smf

item.title: To get Pictures

item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

To get a picture of your server onto the forums the only thing you have to do is when u want a screen shot just press Prt Scr near the top left of the keyboard, then paste it in paint, cut off the sides, then put a rectangle around the pic and save as: … then upload it on http://www.imageshack.us/ make it 21inch cuz all the other ones are small and then copy and paste one of the lines of the url onto the thread and it should have a link or directly on the thread.

Anyone who wants to put comments just post them… Thank you
I am usually Mago on any servers so just talk to me if you see me
